input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: You've never experienced a long-sleeve shirt like this! This MLB Philadelphia Phillies delay of game shirt is a must-have for any fan. Made from a cotton and organic cotton blend, this shirt is as comfortable as it is stylish. The woven label and self-fabric applique add a touch of baseball history to the design, while the full-zip closure allows for easy wear. Whether you're wearing it at the stadium or at the office, this shirt is sure to make a statement.
input_text.Response B: The Phillies Delay Of Game Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip is perfect for a chilly game day, or any day! Made of 94% Cotton/6% Organic Cotton, this comfortable, versatile top features a woven label, self-fabric applique, and a full-zip front. Made in Egypt, it looks great with your favorite team's colors. Root on your Phillies in style!
